<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com he de fer un resum?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you write a précis?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie schreiben Sie précis?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment écrivez-vous des précis ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você escreve précis?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come scrivete i précis?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς γράφετε τα prιcis;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre què és un resum. S'hi donen unes indicacions per  realitzar el resum  de manera correcta (comprensió del text, idees principals...). Adreçat a alumnes a partir del cicle superior.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on what a précis is. It explains how to write a précis properly (comprehension of the text, main ideas, etc.) Aimed at 10- to 12-years-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, welchem 
précis ist. Sie erklärt, wie man précis richtig schreibt 
(Erfassen des Textes, der Grundgedanken, des usw..) Angestrebte 
10 zu 12-years-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur quel les précis est. 
Il explique comment écrire des précis correctement (la 
compréhension du texte, des idées principales, etc...) 10 
visés à 12-years-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em que os précis são. 
Explica como escrever corretamente précis (a compreensão do 
texto, das idéias principais, etc..) 10- visados a 
12-years-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su che précis è. Spiega
come scrivere correttamente i précis (comprensione del testo, delle 
idee principali, ecc.) 10 puntati su a 12-years-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) σε αυτά που prιcis 
είναι. Εξηγεί πώς να γράψει τα prιcis κατάλληλα 
(κατανόηση του κειμένου, των βασικών ιδεών, κ.λπ....) 
Στοχευμένος σε 10 στα 12-έτη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
